problem: 如图,DE是△ABC中AC边的垂直平分线.BC=8厘米,AB=10厘米,则△EBC的周长为()厘米
answer: 解:∵DE是△ABC中AC边的垂直平分线,∴AE=CE,∴AB=AE+BE=CE+BE=10厘米,∴△EBC的周长=BC+BE+CE=8+10=18(厘米).故选B.
comment: 本题考查了线段垂直平分线性质的应用,注意:线段垂直平分线上的点到线段两个端点的距离相等.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, DE is the perpendicular bisector of the AC of △ABC. BC = N_0 centimetres, AB = N_1 centimetres, then the perimeter of △EBC is () centimetres
